attributes.action: I am wanting the government to STOP councils from using bailiffs
attributes.additional_details:
I can not highlight the stress that bailiffs put on to people i have spoken to many people regarding bailiffs and council tax and pcn and some people have been reduced to tears or depression has become worse .
Many people are vulnerable and most of the time the council ignore this which is a disgusting way to treat a human being
attributes.background: Councils needs to stop using these bailiffs to collect these debts which can be easily addressed if the council actually communicated and had decent customer care for people .
